hotels.title: Award-Winning Wine-Lovers' Romantic Retreat near Queenstown with Daily Breakfast & Wine Tasting
hotels.description: Soak up Central Otago's spectacular natural scenery and discover local wines with a stay at this acclaimed vineyard retreat, set amid lush vines and rolling hinterland just 25 minutes from Queenstown. A private haven of 24 architecturally designed villas, Gibbston Valley Lodge & Spa offers your perfect chance to savour New Zealand's natural majesty to the last drop. Outstanding service and superb elegance await as days are spent exploring the lush grounds, sampling gourmet food and fine wine at The Lodge or relaxing in your secluded courtyard overlooking the historic vineyards. This wine- and nature-lovers’ retreat also features a 24-hour fitness centre, sauna and heated pool access, valet parking and a wonderful luxe spa - crowned 'New Zealand's Best Resort Spa' in the 2024 World Spa Awards.
